Reviews.Title: “OK for 2 star hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel close bus station center city 2 metro stations 5 10 minutes walking closed gaudi park walking clean staff helpful breakfast offer possibility wide choice recommend eating cafes special local food try provided soap shampoo beginning stay else offered taking consideration 2 start hotel price ok staying
